name: 吳斯偉
objective:
本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性。如何作好服務並使顧客滿意，達程服務創新。內容：服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、服務創新，個案討論。
Service management is to discuss How to manage service, satisfy customers and develop innovation service models. The topics of the course: Service concept, the service delivery system, Service facility and layout, productivity and quality improvement, forecasting, service quality, service strategy, customer satisfaction, service innovation, and case study.
schedule: 1-18 週 使用不同主題之哈佛、光華個案做討論
